title: Please make a new skin for Vel'koz
body:
The last skin for Vel'koz was released 4 years ago (I don't really want to count April fool's one).

Why don't you make a new one for him? Or even chromas?

The concept of the champion is boundless!! He can join star guardian, battle academia, and any other series..

Stop making Ahri skins. I know she makes money a lot. But, there are so many people playing their main champs with old skins like {{champion:240}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:516}} .

Please take care of them.

replies.body:
Then they should REALLY put him into the Star Guardian universe 

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

The problem is, Vel'koz is just too..."perfect". He is just too simple as an design to explore.
I main Velkoz for like 5 years now and I have to say. an floating eyeball with three tentacles is just way too hard to arrange into something new.
Why don't you count april fools?
